```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
here()
rawdat <- read.csv(here('original', 'maternalmortality.csv'),header=TRUE)
rawdat
```
```{r}
rawdat <- rawdat %>% select(Country.Name,X2000:X2019)

```


```{r}
rawdat
```

```{r}
rawdat_long <- rawdat %>% tidyr::pivot_longer(
  cols = dplyr::starts_with("X"),
  names_to= "Year",
  names_prefix = "X",
  values_to = "MatMor"
  
) %>%
  mutate(Year=as.numeric(Year))
head(rawdat_long,20)
```
